ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Implements a class and methods to work with sets, doing intersection, union, complementary sets, power sets, cartesian product and other set operations in a "tidy" way. These set operations are available for both classical sets and fuzzy sets. Import sets from several formats or from other several data structures.

Implements a class and methods to work with sets, doing intersection, union, complementary sets, power sets, cartesian product and other set operations in a "tidy" way. These set operations are available for both classical sets and fuzzy sets. Import sets from several formats or from other several data structures.

name: r-baseset
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-baseset
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/BaseSet_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/BaseSet/BaseSet_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 51506df115765a5a07d0ec674377ec11b0a1006c3dda7df0e82de373034156cc

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}  # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ posix }}zip             # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-rlang
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-rlang

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('BaseSet')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('BaseSet')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://docs.ropensci.org/BaseSet/
  dev_url: https://github.com/ropensci/BaseSet
  license: MIT
  summary: Implements a class and methods to work with sets, doing intersection, union, complementary sets, power sets, cartesian product and other set operations in a "tidy" way. These set operations are available for both classical sets and fuzzy sets. Import sets from several formats or from other several data structures.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - mjsteinbaugh

# Package: BaseSet
# Title: Working with Sets the Tidy Way
# Version: 0.9.0
# Authors@R:
#     c(person(given = "Lluís",
#              family = "Revilla Sancho",
#              role = c("aut", "cre", "cph"),
#              email = "lluis.revilla@gmail.com",
#              comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0001-9747-2570")),
#       person(given = "Zebulun",
#              family = "Arendsee",
#              role = "rev"),
#       person(given = "Jennifer Chang",
#              role = "rev"))
# Description: Implements a class and methods to work with sets,
#     doing intersection, union, complementary sets, power sets, cartesian
#     product and other set operations in a "tidy" way. These set operations
#     are available for both classical sets and fuzzy sets. Import sets from
#     several formats or from other several data structures.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://github.com/ropensci/BaseSet,
#         https://docs.ropensci.org/BaseSet/
# BugReports: https://github.com/ropensci/BaseSet/issues
# Depends: R (>= 4.0.0)
# Imports: dplyr (>= 1.0.0), magrittr, methods, rlang, utils
# Suggests: Biobase, covr, forcats, ggplot2, GO.db, GSEABase, knitr,
#         org.Hs.eg.db, reactome.db, rmarkdown, spelling, testthat (>=
#         2.1.0)
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Language: en-US
# RoxygenNote: 7.2.3
# Collate: 'validity.R' 'AllClasses.R' 'AllGenerics.R'
#         'BaseSet-package.R' 'GMT.R' 'GeneSetCollection.R' 'activate.R'
#         'add.R' 'add_column.R' 'add_relation.R' 'adjacency.R'
#         'arrange.R' 'c.R' 'cardinality.R' 'cartesian.R' 'complement.R'
#         'data_frame.R' 'deactivate.R' 'droplevels.R' 'elements.R'
#         'extract.R' 'filter.R' 'group.R' 'group_by.R' 'head.R'
#         'incidence.R' 'independent.R' 'operations.R' 'intersection.R'
#         'length.R' 'list.R' 'move_to.R' 'mutate.R' 'names.R' 'naming.R'
#         'nested.R' 'obo.R' 'power_set.R' 'print.R' 'pull.R'
#         'relations.R' 'remove.R' 'remove_column.R' 'rename.R'
#         'select.R' 'set.R' 'size.R' 'subtract.R' 'tidy-set.R' 'union.R'
#         'union_closed.R' 'utils-pipe.R' 'utils.R' 'zzz.R'
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2023-08-19 17:58:21 UTC; lluis
# Author: Lluís Revilla Sancho [aut, cre, cph]
#     (<https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9747-2570>),
